com.gopivotal.examples.hbase.ingest

Class TwitterBulkLoad

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      • com.gopivotal.mapreduce.lib.driver.AbstractMapReduceDriver
        • com.gopivotal.examples.hbase.ingest.TwitterBulkLoad
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool

    public class TwitterBulkLoad
extends com.gopivotal.mapreduce.lib.driver.AbstractMapReduceDriver
    This class will bulk load an HBase table of tweets and then bulk load an input JSON data set into the table.

    It is assumed the table has already been created.
